comments:
While debugging an applet suddenly the VM disconnected. Last action before: I traced code where an Iterator instance was created. Then I clicked the iterator variable in Variables view to see the content. The Application wasn't controlleable after that and hanging at the breakpoint. Debug view showed it as <disconnected>
